page.title: 07HOBBIES AND RECREATION
page.content: Hobbies are very popular in the area of Garstang.On Thursday 25th June 1985 a survey was carried out in the centre of town.A cross section of people were asked with the assistance of a tape recorder.Each person was asked if they had a hobby? Quite a number of people had more than one hobby.I have four hobbies.The most popular hobby in Garstang was gardening.Other leisure time activities which figured prominently were walking having a drink with friends or reading.To assess childrens hobbies Children throughout the school were asked.Strange hobbies were given :collecting badges,rubbers looking after fish, looking at wildlife,gymnastics,swimming,soccer.The building of a new sports centre in the near future may well see a change in the hobbies of the adults and children of Garstang. By M.Fairclough.
